title: Jakob Gimpel, pianist: program No. 13
creator_credit: Paul Gordon, George Moskov and Official Films
brief_description: A Felix Mendelssohn recital performed by Polish-American pianist, Jakob Gimpel, featuring “Etude in F Major” (Opus 104, No. 2), and two songs without words - “Lost illusions” (Opus 67, No. 2) and “Spinning song” (Opus 67, No. 4).
